mapper.select: SELECT c.FNAME companyName , ws.FNAME workshopName , a.FNAME areaName , d.FID deviceId , rd.FSTATUS status , rd.FPH ph , rd.FEMISSION_LOAD emissionLoad , rd.FLMODIFY lmodify FROM T_WORKSHOP ws JOIN T_COMPANY c ON c.FID = ws.FCOMPANY_ID LEFT JOIN T_DEVICE d ON d.FWORKSHOP_ID = ws.FID LEFT JOIN T_COMPANY_REALTIME_DATA rd ON rd.FWORKSHOP_ID = ws.FID JOIN T_AREA a ON a.FID = c.FAREA_ID
